decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).

Condition : 3 - 3.	Full details including sections at scale 1:5 (or as appropriate) of the new dormers shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any work on site is commenced.  The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus provided.
Condition : 4 - The proposed roof lights shall be flush fitted with the roof face (i.e. conservation type).

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no windows/dormer windows/roof lights or other modifications to the roof slopes [other than those expressly authorised by this permission] shall be constructed.
description: Erection of roof extension incorporating roof light to dwellinghouse.
